text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom Taiwan assigned a frontlines medical team of 50 nurses heading us to assist USA to combat the coronavirus,leading by Taiwan VP/specialist Chen Jianren Doctor.They are on the way,great help
